dialog.text: It's time you two learn how to survive out there. If you're going to be out in the snow all winter you're going to need your mittens.
If you can find them and get out of the backyard without getting spotted you should be ready for the upcoming battles.
If one of you gets spotted by the enemy, the other has only one chance to come to the rescue by taking the enemy out, so be careful. Good luck soldiers.
